name: Sports Rorts 20 2.0
description:
The true blue Aussie battler game. You decide how the latest $100m sports grants should be distributed throughout the country. After receiving an independent assessment listing the most eligible programs, you know there's only one use for that - as test paper for the shredder!

It's election time down under and your party needs all the votes it can get. So using your political prowess you realize the best way to win votes is to buy them! So pour yourself a hot cuppa, cause we're pulling out the electoral maps!

Score points for correctly allocating funds to marginal electorates, and lose points for improperly allocating funds to Labor!

Let the pork barreling commence!
